## Throughput

### Import the data
```{r, echo=F}
(throughput <- read.csv(file = 'throughput.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE))
```

### Show dataframes internal structure
```{r}
str(throughput)
```

- Separate histograms
```{r}
hist(throughput$DFN, breaks = 10)
hist(throughput$Telekom, breaks = 10)
```

- Prepare data for ggplot
```{r}
library(reshape2)
throughput_plot <- melt(throughput)
colnames(throughput_plot) <- c("provider", "throughput")
```

- Combined histogram
```{r, message=F, warning=F}
library(ggplot2)

p <- ggplot(throughput_plot, aes(x=throughput, fill=provider))
p <- p + geom_histogram(alpha=0.7, binwidth = 0.02)
p
```

- Combined density plot
```{r}
p <- ggplot(throughput_plot, aes(x=throughput, fill=provider))
p <- p + geom_density()
p
```
